title: Why the polarised reaction to Jordan Peterson? Dialogue with Andrew Sweeny
description:
Why does Jordan Peterson create such strong and polarised reactions? Andrew Sweeny has written many articles examining Peterson's impact on the culture. In this Skype chat with David Fuller, director of two documentaries about Jordan Peterson, he explains how the reaction to Peterson is largely due to the way that Peterson is reviving a perspective that many thought had been banished forever. It accompanies this Medium article - Jordan Peterson and the Dark Tide of Mysticism: https://medium.com/rebel-wisdom/jordan-peterson-and-the-black-tide-of-mysticism-2c9b8d2abe6c

For more great Rebel Wisdom content - visit: http://rebelwisdom.co.uk/
